import styles from './HotNews.module.css' import React from 'react' import clsx from 'clsx' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function HotNews({ data }) { return (
{ data && (
MULTIMEDIA

{data[0].caption}

{data[0].description}

{data[1].caption}

{data[2].caption}

{data[3].caption}

{data[4].caption}

) }
) }
